name: Untilted top-down shooter for learning godot
name_original: Untilted top-down shooter for learning godot
description: Well, here goes nothing, i guess, it's the first "game" i've created, not much, but it's all mine (and by all i mean all programming, art and music is free). Probably anyone is going to see/play this, but i wanted to have a place where to upload what i do, specially since the idea is that this one is the first of many... so yeah, that's it.
